description:
Special Equipment for Xander. 
Gain a Barrier based on the User's current TP and gains a unique Instant.
name: Omnath, Locus of Mana

description:
Special Equipment for Leonard. 
Reduces the TP and MP cost of Skills and Instants.
name: Grand Arbiter Augustin IV

description:
Special Equipment for Oren. 
Using Fracture or Vanishing Verse now only consumes one point of Dread Sniper. \nStarts with an extra Dread Sniper point.
name: Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher

description:
Special Equipment for Theodore.
Gains access to Instant versions of all Skills.
name: Volo, Guide to Monsters

description:
A larger container for die for more experienced players.
Contains 2 dies.
name: Dice Bag

description: Gains small HP regeneration per turn.
name: Generic Playmat
